name: VR Zoo Animals Roller Coaster
description:
We build zoo for our guests, but this one is in virtual reality. Feel the 360 experience with wild animals in safari park. Just take your vr headset and enjoy wildlife adventure in virtual zoo.

You can observe many carnivores such as lion, crocodile and bear. You will also find herbivorous creatures. Elephant, rhino or antelope.

Visit our virtual zoo without worrying about your life. You can get closer than ever.

Features:
its vr zoo
virtual reality game
wild animals are one step away from you
works with many vr devices
